value:
Katarina and the others may be shy,
but this is a festival and this clothing
has meaning. You'll join me, right?

*sigh* What a waste. My time would
be better spent continuing the
ceremony.

Oh my, is the sun too much for you?
Or am I the reason for your flushed
cheeks? Hmhm, I'm simply joking.

Plegia wasted such time on bitterness
and hatred... These are feelings that
I never shared with my homeland.

Shell of turtle, tongue of lizard... Hm?
Oh, I'm mixing a bug-repelling
perfume for Dorothea and Lene.

I'm Tharja, from Plegia. And you—
You know $Nf?$k$pOh... Then I guess I won't curse you.

Hmhmhm... It seems last night's
ceremony is already bearing fruit.

My curses are much more reliable
than any prayer or wish. Wouldn't
you agree?

Ugh... I feel sick to my stomach. I
wonder if one of my curses somehow
bounced back at me...
Hmph. What is it you want from me?

I'm Tharja. And this is the attire of an
ancient festival. Perhaps that of a
sacrificial maiden?$k$pOr perhaps of the one performing the
deed...

Ugh, I'm exhausted from being led
around all day. So many people...
Why even leave home for this?$k$pEnjoy myself, you say? Oh, please... I
care nothing for the smiles of others.
I live only for my fated love.$k$pHmm... But when I heard your voice, I
thought maybe dressing up and going
out now and again isn't all bad.$k$pYou remind me of my fated one. So
I'll follow your lead for now... I'll
allow only you to drag me out.$k$pBut betray me, and it will be your
undoing. The sorcery of this land will
turn you into my eternal servant.
それ…
Here I go...
きゃあっ
What nerve...
Here. Have a curse.
How would you like to die?
No escaping me.
Suffer.
Over already?
Hee hee hee...
This is the garb of my homeland. I think it suits me. Don't you?
Ugh. Your manners are severely lacking.
I don't exactly long to return to Plegia... But I do miss it.
Shoo, shoo! Stop pestering me! Can't you see I'm observing Robin?
My curses have become more effective since joining with the Order of Heroes.
You want to attend a Plegian festival? You're an unusual one.
If there's someone you deem deserving of a curse, don't hesitate to seek me out. It will be my pleasure.
Let's go.
Are you sure?
Got a curse.
